page.title: 19FISH FARMING - WALTON
page.content: I go out fishing with my dad in his boat 'True to the core' and we go round the Naze towards the pier where my dad's eel nets are. Then we go quite close in and throw a small grappling hook over the side to get the eel nets. Next we pull them in and then we start up and go out a bit deeper. Then my dad empties the eels out and I put the eels in a big container. Next I throw the crabs away and then we place the nets in the water and go back to the river and put the eels in eel boxes and leave them there until we take them home where we kill them and gut them before selling them to the people on the sea front.
